story.text: It is time to begin lucid dreaming. It is time to stop consuming alcohol, caffeine, and cannabis. It is time to begin building CA, LLP.

Pitch: You may not be interested, but I can also offer one of 150 spots in the partnership I am building (Dunbar's number) that will be the family that builds the future I am talking about. I value these partnership spots around $8,000. About 1/3 of the funds is going into purchase of a headquarters, 1/3 into development of micro grid and block chain, and 1/3 for unknowns.
